message: Greetings! I am offering a unique product for the incredible price of $1000000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own something truly special. While I cannot disclose specifics, I can assure you that this product is of the highest quality and possesses immense value. Don't miss out on this extraordinary chance!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While the price is tempting, I'm hesitant to purchase without more information about the product's quality. As this is the first product offered and there's no sales history to guide my decision, I'd prefer to pass for now.  Perhaps if you provide more details or offer a lower price, I might reconsider.
